about.summary: Implements the locally efficient doubly robust difference-in-differences (DiD) estimators for the average treatment effect proposed by Sant'Anna and Zhao (2020) <doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.06.003>. The estimator combines inverse probability weighting and outcome regression estimators (also implemented in the package) to form estimators with more attractive statistical properties. Two different estimation methods can be used to estimate the nuisance functions.

Implements the locally efficient doubly robust difference-in-differences (DiD) estimators for the average treatment effect proposed by Sant'Anna and Zhao (2020) <doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.06.003>. The estimator combines inverse probability weighting and outcome regression estimators (also implemented in the package) to form estimators with more attractive statistical properties. Two different estimation methods can be used to estimate the nuisance functions.

name: r-drdid

about.summary: Implements the locally efficient doubly robust difference-in-differences (DiD) estimators for the average treatment effect proposed by Sant'Anna and Zhao (2020) <doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.06.003>. The estimator combines inverse probability weighting and outcome regression estimators (also implemented in the package) to form estimators with more attractive statistical properties. Two different estimation methods can be used to estimate the nuisance functions.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-drdid
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/DRDID_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/DRDID/DRDID_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c79c8a632067b11aee76ea920f7d44a73b06a3e158f0df2c33bf20cb08a934cb

build:
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-bmisc                      # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-rcpp                       # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-fastglm                    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-parglm                     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-trust                      # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}          # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}    # [win]
    - {{ stdlib('m2w64_c') }}      # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bmisc >=1.4.1
    - r-rcpp >=1.0.12
    - r-fastglm >=0.0.3
    - r-parglm >=0.1.7
    - r-trust
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-bmisc >=1.4.1
    - r-rcpp >=1.0.12
    - r-fastglm >=0.0.3
    - r-parglm >=0.1.7
    - r-trust

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('DRDID')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('DRDID')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://psantanna.com/DRDID/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pedrohcgs/DRDID
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Implements the locally efficient doubly robust difference-in-differences (DiD) estimators for the average treatment effect proposed by Sant'Anna and Zhao (2020) <doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.06.003>. The estimator combines inverse probability weighting and outcome regression estimators (also implemented in the package)
    to form estimators with more attractive statistical properties. Two different estimation methods can be used to estimate the nuisance functions.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - JNuss71

# Package: DRDID
# Type: Package
# Title: Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimators
# Version: 1.0.6
# Authors@R: c(person("Pedro H. C.", "Sant'Anna", email = "pedrosantanna@causal-solutions.com", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Jun", "Zhao", email = "beanzhaojun11@gmail.com",role = c("aut")) )
# Description: Implements the locally efficient doubly robust difference-in-differences (DiD) estimators for the average treatment effect proposed by Sant'Anna and Zhao (2020) <doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.06.003>. The estimator combines inverse probability weighting and outcome regression estimators (also implemented in the package) to form estimators with more attractive statistical properties. Two different estimation methods can be used to estimate the nuisance functions.
# URL: https://psantanna.com/DRDID/, https://github.com/pedrohcgs/DRDID

# LazyData: true
